#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>

int calculate(int num);
int main()
{
	int day,year,number,i,total;
	char months[12];
	char month[12][12] = {"January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"};
	
	scanf("%d %s %d",&day, months, &year);
	
	for(i=0;i<12;i++)
	{
		if (strcmp(month[i], months) == 0)
		{
			total = day * (i + 1) + year;
			break;
		}
	}

	total = calculate(total);
	
	printf("%d\n", total);
	
	return 0;
}

int calculate(int num)
{
	int sum = 0;
	
	do
	{
		sum += num%10;
		num = num/10; 
	}
	while ((num!=0));
	
	if (sum/10==0) 
		return sum;
	else
		return calculate(sum);
}
